page.title: 13LAW AND ORDER
page.content: In our area patrols only take place occasionally and then an area car is used. Sometimes a one-man car will patrol the area. There are several village policemen in our D block and they patrol constantly. Crime is not a problem though alcohol and drugs are as they promote vandalism.This crime is punished either by a suspended sentence or imprisonment. A few thefts take place at Botley railway station, usually involving stolen bicycles. Police often have to deal with the traffic at Fairs and Fetes at places like Fairthorne Manor. {
